question: Which scholars won prizes in Physics and were affiliated with the University of Cambridge?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('physics') AND toLower(i.name) CONTAINS toLower('university of cambridge') RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate

question: How many scholars won prizes in Chemistry?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('chemistry') RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS count

question: List all scholars who won a Medicine prize.
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('medicine') RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate

question: How many prizes were awarded in Economics after 1980?
cypher_query: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('economics') AND p.awardYear > 1980 RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT p) AS count

question: Which institutions have affiliated Physics laureates?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('physics') RETURN DISTINCT i.name AS institution

question: How many laureates were born in Germany?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS toLower('germany') RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS count

question: Which scholars were born in the United States but affiliated with the University of Cambridge?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS toLower('united states') AND toLower(i.name) CONTAINS toLower('university of cambridge') RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate

question: List all institutions located in cities in France.
cypher_query: MATCH (i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS toLower('france') RETURN DISTINCT i.name AS institution

question: How many laureates were born in Europe?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(con:Continent) WHERE toLower(con.name) CONTAINS toLower('europe') RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS count

question: Which scholars have won more than one Nobel Prize?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WITH s, COUNT(DISTINCT p) AS numPrizes WHERE numPrizes > 1 RETURN s.knownName AS laureate, numPrizes ORDER BY numPrizes DESC

question: For each prize category, how many distinct laureates are there?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WITH toLower(p.category) AS category, COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS numLaureates RETURN category, numLaureates ORDER BY category

question: Which cities have produced at least five laureates by birth?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City) WITH ci, COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS numLaureates WHERE numLaureates >= 5 RETURN ci.name AS city, numLaureates ORDER BY numLaureates DESC

question: Which laureates died in the same city where they were born?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(birthCity:City) MATCH (s)-[:DIED_IN]->(deathCity:City) WHERE toLower(birthCity.name) = toLower(deathCity.name) RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate, birthCity.name AS city ORDER BY laureate

question: How many Physics prizes were awarded from 2000 onwards?
cypher_query: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('physics') AND p.awardYear >= 2000 RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT p) AS count

question: How many laureates have been affiliated with institutions in the United States?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS toLower('united states') RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS count

question: Which continents have Chemistry laureates by birth?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) MATCH (s)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(con:Continent) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('chemistry') RETURN DISTINCT con.name AS continent

question: List all female laureates who won prizes in Chemistry.
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('chemistry') AND toLower(s.gender) CONTAINS toLower('female') RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate

question: What is the total prize amount awarded in Physics?
cypher_query: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('physics') RETURN SUM(p.prizeAmount) AS totalPrizeAmount

question: Which institutions have hosted laureates from more than one prize category?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WITH i, COLLECT(DISTINCT toLower(p.category)) AS categories WHERE SIZE(categories) > 1 RETURN i.name AS institution, SIZE(categories) AS numCategories ORDER BY numCategories DESC

question: Which cities host institutions for both Physics and Chemistry laureates?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(ci:City) WITH ci, COLLECT(DISTINCT toLower(p.category)) AS categories WHERE 'physics' IN categories AND 'chemistry' IN categories RETURN ci.name AS city

question: For each continent, how many Physics laureates were born there?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(con:Continent) MATCH (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('physics') WITH con, COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS numLaureates RETURN con.name AS continent, numLaureates ORDER BY numLaureates DESC

question: How many laureates died in the United States?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:DIED_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(co.name) CONTAINS toLower('united states') RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS count

question: Which Physics laureates were affiliated with institutions located in Japan?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('physics') AND toLower(co.name) CONTAINS toLower('japan') RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate, i.name AS institution

question: Which Chemistry prizes had a prize amount greater than 7,000,000?
cypher_query: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('chemistry') AND p.prizeAmount > 7000000 RETURN p.awardYear AS awardYear, p.prizeAmount AS prizeAmount ORDER BY prizeAmount DESC

question: Which Economics laureates were affiliated with Harvard University?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('economics') AND toLower(i.name) CONTAINS toLower('harvard') RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate

question: Which laureates have been affiliated with more than one institution?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WITH s, COUNT(DISTINCT i) AS numInstitutions WHERE numInstitutions > 1 RETURN s.knownName AS laureate, numInstitutions ORDER BY numInstitutions DESC

question: What is the average adjusted prize amount per category for prizes awarded from 1980 onwards?
cypher_query: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE p.awardYear >= 1980 WITH toLower(p.category) AS category, AVG(p.prizeAmountAdjusted) AS avgAdjusted RETURN category, avgAdjusted ORDER BY category

question: Which Chemistry laureates have been affiliated with at least two different institutions?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('chemistry') WITH s, COUNT(DISTINCT i) AS numInstitutions WHERE numInstitutions >= 2 RETURN s.knownName AS laureate, numInstitutions

question: Which Medicine prizes were shared by more than one laureate?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('medicine') WITH p, COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS numLaureates WHERE numLaureates > 1 RETURN p.awardYear AS awardYear, p.category AS category, numLaureates ORDER BY awardYear

question: Which female laureates won Nobel prizes in Physics after 1960?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('physics') AND toLower(s.gender) CONTAINS toLower('female') AND p.awardYear > 1960 RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate, p.awardYear AS awardYear ORDER BY awardYear ASC

question: How many Nobel prizes in Economics were awarded between 1990 and 1999?
cypher_query: MATCH (p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('economics') AND p.awardYear >= 1990 AND p.awardYear <= 1999 RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT p) AS count

question: List institutions in Japan that have Chemistry laureates.
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('chemistry') AND toLower(co.name) CONTAINS toLower('japan') RETURN DISTINCT i.name AS institution ORDER BY institution

question: Which laureates were born in the same city where they later worked?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(birthCity:City) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(affCity:City) WHERE toLower(birthCity.name) = toLower(affCity.name) RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate, birthCity.name AS city ORDER BY laureate

question: For each continent, how many distinct laureates have affiliated institutions there?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(con:Continent) WITH con, COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS numLaureates RETURN con.name AS continent, numLaureates ORDER BY numLaureates DESC

question: Which countries have produced laureates in both Physics and Chemistry by birth?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) MATCH (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WITH co, COLLECT(DISTINCT toLower(p.category)) AS categories WHERE 'physics' IN categories AND 'chemistry' IN categories RETURN co.name AS country

question: Which cities have institutions affiliated with Medicine laureates?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(ci:City) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('medicine') RETURN DISTINCT ci.name AS city

question: How many different portion values exist for Physics prizes?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[r:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('physics') RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT r.portion) AS count

question: Which Physics laureates were born in Europe and received their prize before 1950?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(con:Continent) MATCH (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(con.name) CONTAINS toLower('europe') AND toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('physics') AND p.awardYear < 1950 RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate, p.awardYear AS awardYear ORDER BY awardYear

question: How many female laureates have won prizes in Medicine?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('medicine') AND toLower(s.gender) CONTAINS toLower('female') RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS count

question: Which Economics laureates were born in a different country than the country of their affiliated institution?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(birthCity:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(birthCountry:Country) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(affCity:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(affCountry:Country) MATCH (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('economics') AND toLower(birthCountry.name) <> toLower(affCountry.name) RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate, birthCountry.name AS birthCountry, affCountry.name AS affiliationCountry

question: Which Physics laureates were born in cities located in Asia?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(con:Continent) MATCH (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(con.name) CONTAINS toLower('asia') AND toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('physics') RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate

question: Which scholars were affiliated with institutions located in the same country where they were born?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(bCity:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(bCountry:Country) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(aCity:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(aCountry:Country) WHERE toLower(bCountry.name) = toLower(aCountry.name) RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS scholar, bCountry.name AS country

question: How many laureates in Chemistry were born before 1900?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE toLower(p.category) CONTAINS toLower('chemistry') AND s.birthDate < 1900 RETURN COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS count

question: Which institutions have hosted laureates whose birth and death both occurred in Europe?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(bCity:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(bCountry:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(bCont:Continent) MATCH (s)-[:DIED_IN]->(dCity:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(dCountry:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(dCont:Continent) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution) WHERE toLower(bCont.name) CONTAINS toLower('europe') AND toLower(dCont.name) CONTAINS toLower('europe') RETURN DISTINCT i.name AS institution

question: Which laureates were affiliated with institutions on a different continent than their birth continent?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(bCity:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(bCountry:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(bCont:Continent) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(aCity:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(aCountry:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(aCont:Continent) WHERE toLower(bCont.name) <> toLower(aCont.name) RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS scholar, bCont.name AS birthContinent, aCont.name AS affiliationContinent

question: Which countries have produced laureates who won prizes in both Medicine and Physics?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) MATCH (s)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WITH co, COLLECT(DISTINCT toLower(p.category)) AS categories WHERE 'medicine' IN categories AND 'physics' IN categories RETURN co.name AS country

question: Which laureates won a prize before the age of 40?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:WON]->(p:Prize) WHERE (p.awardYear - s.birthDate) < 40 RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate, p.awardYear AS year, (p.awardYear - s.birthDate) AS ageAtAward ORDER BY ageAtAward

question: For each continent, how many laureates have died there?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:DIED_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(con:Continent) WITH con, COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS num RETURN con.name AS continent, num ORDER BY num DESC

question: Which laureates were born in cities that host institutions they were also affiliated with?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(bCity:City) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(aCity:City) WHERE toLower(bCity.name) = toLower(aCity.name) RETURN DISTINCT s.knownName AS laureate, bCity.name AS city

question: Which scholars have affiliations in at least three different countries?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(ci:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(co:Country) WITH s, COUNT(DISTINCT co) AS numCountries WHERE numCountries >= 3 RETURN s.knownName AS scholar, numCountries ORDER BY numCountries DESC

question: For each birth continent, how many laureates later worked at institutions on a different continent?
cypher_query: MATCH (s:Scholar)-[:BORN_IN]->(bCity:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(bCountry:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(bCont:Continent) MATCH (s)-[:AFFILIATED_WITH]->(i:Institution)-[:IS_LOCATED_IN]->(aCity:City)-[:IS_CITY_IN]->(aCountry:Country)-[:IS_COUNTRY_IN]->(aCont:Continent) WHERE toLower(bCont.name) <> toLower(aCont.name) WITH bCont, COUNT(DISTINCT s) AS numLaureates RETURN bCont.name AS birthContinent, numLaureates ORDER BY numLaureates DESC
